https://tmrev.io/movie/783478-Augenleuchten 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rLNOBPg8o7CW3KAmfbE72hbGB9I.jpg A village in Upper Austria. The sudden death of his mother drives ten-year old Wastl into isolation. His only friend is Franziska, a 16-year-old girl from a conservative, sober-minded family background who dreams of a dancing career. A very exceptional, subtile love story develops against all odds. Augenleuchten
